We are logging the error when we do not need to be - however, I do not know 
how you ended up with the "invalid" breakpoint. When I delete a method with 
breakpoints, the breakpoints are also deleted. (Using "delete" from the editor 
outline, then save the CU).

Removed error logging from JDIModelPresentation.
